'''The Three Principles of Power''' is [[Iansan]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* For every '''2m''' of movement logged by the Kinetic Energy Scale within the previous second, Iansan will gain 1 Nightsoul Point.
